# `useChangeEmail()`

## Overload 1

Change email hook

```js
const { changeEmail, isLoading, needsEmailVerification, isError, error } =
  useChangeEmail()
```

### Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">options</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `ChangeEmailOptions`

---

### Examples

```js
const { changeEmail, isLoading, needsEmailVerification, isError, error } =
  useChangeEmail()
```

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { useChangeEmail } from '@nhost/react'

const Component = () => {
  const [email, setEmail] = useState('')
  const { changeEmail, isLoading, needsEmailVerification, isError, error } =
    useChangeEmail()

  return (
    <div>
      <input value={email} onChange={(event) => setEmail(event.target.value)} />
      <button onClick={() => changeEmail(email)}>Change email</button>

      {needsEmailVerification && (
        <div>
          Please check your mailbox and follow the verification link to confirm
          your new email
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  )
}
```
